title: Soylent Green
creator_credit: Russell Thacher, Stanley R. Greenberg, Walter Seltzer, Pat Barto, Richard Fleischer and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: In an overpopulated futuristic Earth, a New York police detective finds himself marked for murder by government agents when he gets too close to a bizarre state secret involving the origins of a revolutionary and needed new foodstuff.

constellations_other.name: Arcades and AI
constellations_other.description: Using the godfather of computing, Alan Turing, as a starting point, this Constellation traces the evolution of AI representation on-screen and the way female androids, robots and holograms have been hyper sexualised.
